title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Unable to open file in another editor if it is already opened (should display error message)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Unable to open file in another editor if it is already opened (should display error message)
OB:
1. Close the file if it is already open in the editor.
2. Go to the Java Perspective.
3. Open a Java file by double-clicking on it.
4. The file is now opened in the workbench.
5. Right-click on the Java file.
6. Select 'Open With' -> 'System Editor'.
7. Nothing happens.

The workbench should display a warning message indicating that opening the file may overwrite changes and prompting to confirm the action, or an error message stating that all files need to be closed first.

This behavior seems to be a safety feature in WSAD where external editing is not allowed while the file is already opened in WSAD.
